text: This is a list of episodes from the seventh season of Alice. ==Episodes== ==Broadcast history== The season was aired Wednesday nights at 9:00-9:30 pm (EST) from October 6 to November 10, 1982,TV Listings for November 10, 1982 before being moved to Sunday nights at 9:30-10:00 pm (EST) where it aired on January 9 and January 16, 1983 TV Listings for January 9, 1983TV Listings for January 16, 1983 before being switched to Mondays at 9:00-9:30pm (EST). It was again moved to Sunday nights at 9:30-10-00 pm (EST) on May 1, 1983 TV Listings for May 1, 1983 before the airing time was switched to 8:00-8:30 pm (EST) on Sundays on September 18, 1983.TV Listings for September 18, 1983 ==References== Category:1982 American television seasons Category:1983 American television seasons
title: Alice (season 7)
